name: Halloween Mayhem
description: Halloween Mayhem is a retro-action title designed around the simplistic nature of 1970's arcade games. Take to the neighborhood streets to collect candy on a Halloween run, but watch out for the Monsters that try to ruin your fun. Try for your own high score while obtaining costumes that help you fight back against your ghoulish foes. Quick game play and simple design make for a game that's easy to come back to again and again. Enjoy the spooky antics of Halloween Mayhem!
